  • Method Details

    • insertCustomerTimer

      public void insertCustomerTimer(CustomerTimers customerTimer)
      Inserts a customer timer record into the customer_timers table in the database.
      Parameters:
      customerTimer - The customer timer object containing data to be inserted.

    • getCustomerTimers

      public List<CustomerTimeData> getCustomerTimers(int simulationId)
      Retrieves all customer timer records for a specific simulation from the customer_timers table.
      Parameters:
      simulationId - The simulation ID to filter the records.
      Returns:
      A list of CustomerTimeData objects containing customer timer data.

    • insertCustomerEventData

      public void insertCustomerEventData(int simulationId, int customerId, String eventType, String mealType, int machine, int chef, int capacity, int generatingTime, int orderingTime, int eatingTime, int payingTime, int timestamp)
      Inserts customer event data into the replay table in the database.
      Parameters:
      simulationId - The simulation ID for the event.
      customerId - The customer ID associated with the event.
      eventType - The type of event (e.g., "order", "serve").
      mealType - The type of meal associated with the event.
      machine - The machine involved in the event.
      chef - The chef responsible for the event.
      capacity - The capacity related to the event.
      generatingTime - The time the event was generated.
      orderingTime - The time taken for ordering.
      eatingTime - The time spent eating.
      payingTime - The time spent paying.
      timestamp - The timestamp of the event.

    • getReplay

      public List<Replay> getReplay(int simulationId)
      Retrieves all replay data for a specific simulation from the replay table.
      Parameters:
      simulationId - The simulation ID to filter the records.
      Returns:
      A list of Replay objects containing event data.

    • insertLog

      public void insertLog(Log log)
      Inserts a log record into the logs table in the database. If a log record with the given simulationId exists, it updates the existing record; otherwise, it inserts a new one.
      Parameters:
      log - The Log object containing data to be inserted or updated.

    • getAllLogs

      public List<Log> getAllLogs()
      Retrieves all log records from the logs table.
      Returns:
      A list of Log objects containing log data.

    • insertListSize

      public void insertListSize(ListSize listSize)
      Inserts a list size record into the list_sizes table in the database.
      Parameters:
      listSize - The ListSize object containing data to be inserted.

    • getListSize

      public List<ListSize> getListSize(int simulationId)
      Retrieves all list size records for a specific simulation from the list_sizes table.
      Parameters:
      simulationId - The simulation ID to filter the records.
      Returns:
      A list of ListSize objects containing list size data.
